snippet: The pianist Jean-Efflam Bavouzet played Bartok’s Third Piano Concerto and the pianist Shai Wosner played an all-Schubert program as part of the Mostly Mozart Music Festival.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performance by pianist Jean-Efflam Bavouzet at Avery Fisher Hall, part of the Mostly Mozart Festival.
lead_paragraph: The pianist Jean-Efflam Bavouzet played Bartok’s Third Piano Concerto and the pianist Shai Wosner played an all-Schubert program as part of the Mostly Mozart Music Festival.

headline.seo: Mostly Mozart Festival with Jean-Efflam Bavouzet, Shai Wosner
headline.main: Mozart Festival Theme Takes Flight, From Lobby to Stage
headline.print_headline: Mozart Festival Theme Takes Flight, From Lobby to Stage
